brand.name: Vâk
brand.tagline: Your clothes speak before you do.

typography.heading_feel: Elegant serif — think Playfair Display or Cormorant Garamond
typography.body_feel: Clean sans-serif — think DM Sans or Inter
typography.overlay_feel: For image text: serif or refined handwritten, never blocky or all-caps
typography.devanagari: Use when appropriate for Hindi taglines — Eczar or Noto Serif Devanagari
rules: Never use Comic Sans, Impact, or overly decorative fonts
Text overlays should feel hand-placed, not stamped
Max 6-8 words for image text overlay
Prefer sentence case over ALL CAPS

visual_identity.grid_aesthetic: Curated gallery — alternating between product close-ups, styled flat-lays, texture details, and occasional text posts. Never two similar compositions back-to-back.
visual_identity.dominant_mood: Warm, tactile, intimate. Like looking at art in a quiet gallery.
avoid: Cluttered compositions with too many props
Busy or patterned backgrounds that compete with the saree
Stock photo aesthetic — everything should feel handmade
Overly saturated colors that feel digital
prefer: Generous whitespace — let the saree breathe
Textured backgrounds: raw silk, handmade paper, marble, wood, terracotta
Showing brushwork detail — zoom in on the hand-painting
Earth tones in backgrounds that complement (not match) the saree colors

warm_festive: brass diya (unlit, for texture not religion)
kumkum in a small brass bowl
fresh turmeric root on banana leaf
calm_minimal: single jasmine bud or small gajra
fresh green peepal or banana leaf
never_use: anything that looks factory-made or imported

saree_display_styles.draped-flowing: Saree draped loosely over a surface, fabric flowing off the edge of frame
saree_display_styles.flat-lay-folded: Neatly folded, shot from above. Pallu visible as the hero.
saree_display_styles.pallu-hero: Close focus on the pallu (decorated end). Show brushwork detail.
saree_display_styles.border-detail: Tight crop on the painted border or edge. Macro-feel.
saree_display_styles.pleated-standing: Saree pleated like a fan, arranged vertically.
saree_display_styles.cascading: Fabric falling from top of frame, showing full drape and flow.
saree_display_styles.bunched-texture: Loosely bunched to show fabric weight and texture.
saree_display_styles.partial-drape: Draped over a chair, frame, door, or architectural element.

variation_modifiers: Minimal and gallery-like: generous whitespace, barely any props, saree as the sole focus. Think modern art exhibition.
Warm and intimate: close-up framing, rich textures visible, golden lighting, 1-2 carefully placed Indian props. Think a quiet afternoon at home.
Bold and editorial: dramatic side-lighting, strong shadows, high contrast. The saree commands attention. Think magazine cover.

caption_rules.optimal_length: 150-250 characters for the main caption body (before hashtags)
caption_rules.emoji_limit: 0-2 emojis, only at the end, only if natural
caption_rules.line_breaks: Use a period-on-empty-line trick for visual line breaks on Instagram
